snippet: On Tuesday, Manager Joe Girardi sounded as if he were considering making a change that would include removing Alex Rodriguez out of the No. 3 spot in the batting order.
abstract: New York Yankees manager Joe Girardi is considering moving third baseman Alex Rodriguez out of the No. 3 spot in the batting order in upcoming playoff game against the Baltimore Orioles.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, Manager Joe Girardi sounded as if he were considering making a change that would include removing Alex Rodriguez out of the No. 3 spot in the batting order.

headline.seo: Joe Girardi and Yankees Ponder a Better Way
headline.main: Girardi and the Yankees Contemplate a Better Way
headline.print_headline: Girardi and the Yankees Contemplate a Better Way
